website_summaries.verdict: A versatile model with a solid build and ample space. It earns our top spot for its many great features.
pros: Neutral espresso color and spacious, sturdy design with open shelf and 2 drawers
cons: The finish occasionally fades or chips
Assembly is difficult, and the instructions are confusing

customer_reviews.title: Much nicer than I expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these nightstands. They arrived within 2 days, packed very well. The only negative of the whole thing was one of the boxes was missing the 2 front side pieces but Amazon sent a new box immediately. Instructions were clear and assembly was easy. They look great and seem quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: vidanovo

customer_reviews.title: once I put it all together it was very sturdy. I didn't have anything break on and me ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very please with this purchase. Sure once you take everything out of the box it does seem a bit flimsy HOWEVER, once I put it all together it was very sturdy. I didn't have anything break on and me and the instructions were pretty clear. Had no issue following instructions and after assembling it And moving it everything is nice and solid. Zero complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: This nightstand it beautiful!! It is a little higher than I ...
customer_reviews.text: This nightstand it beautiful!! It is a little higher than I expect but it's no big deal. The only downside I would say is that none of the items are labeled in the box so it's a bit of a guessing game in the beginning. I am no builder and I did it in less than a hour by myself. I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: LadyHammer0509

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good sized
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and good sized. You have two options for trim on the bottom, so if you buy two, pay attention to which you use. Nice little feature. Some difficulty with some screws, but overall not too bad to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Watson

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if I just had horrible luck with this product but first it came 2
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I just had horrible luck with this product but first it came 2.5 weeks late after it was advertised as prime. Once I received it, it was missing a piece and I believe I was sent either the wrong size drawers or the assembly guide where the nails were supposed to go were off because there is a gap between the drawers. Also, one of the drawers doesn't open all the way and pulls open at an angle. Just poor construction on the manufacturers part.
customer_reviews.author: Miray Can

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Personally I think the quality is great. I bought my own nobs for it, and I'm overjoyed at how great it looks all put together. If I can, I'll post a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kanaar

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for the bedroom and they are perfect height and size for our bed, with 13" mattress. Packaged great and pretty simple to put together, only took a few hours to get two of them together.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand, once you have the parts
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd product this year from Prepac; EVERY single one of them was missing pieces. (This one: so they cut the groove in the wrong place? It will go together... somehow) And when you order replacement parts, they come out of some rural area in BC; I believe, from the speed of shipping, by mountain burro. Three different Prepac pieces (two purchased from Amazon, who did everything right) all sitting around my home for up to two weeks incomplete because Prepac quality control does not exist. They're fine, two weeks later. Do not purchase anything from Prepac with the expectation of using it right away!
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Skora

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Once Assembled — Good Luck Though!
customer_reviews.text: Our home is (unfortunately) filled with furniture I have assembled myself. Typically speaking, I’m pretty darn good at putting stuff together. The directions on this beast made me long for the vague, irritating manuals from *that* Swedish manufacturer. Seriously, worst instructions I have ever seen. I had to take it apart twice during assembly. Once I finally cracked it (on my own, without looking at the manual), it is very nice. Sturdy and looks like a nice piece of furniture. I’m happy with my purchase for the price. Assembly Tip: If your top drawer won’t close, it’s because the cross piece actually does have an up and down side, despite not being specified. Pull it off and flip it over.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I saw other reviews about how awful these were, but I'd have to say I don't agree. These came well packed, with all the pieces and the color was as expected. We bought two of these and two of the dressers to match. Once you get one put together, the others went much faster. We glued everything which helped these be much stronger than I'm sure they normally would be. I really like that these are taller than normal night stands as we have a tall bed and now don't have to reach down to shut off the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Side panels arrived cracked on the interior sides
customer_reviews.text: Both side panels arrived cracked on the interior sides. Still, I decided to take a leap of faith and not return it since it would not be visible once assembled. It is NOT real wood. Assembling the product is quite tricky since the instructions are not very clear. It will take you about 1 and a half hours to put together on your own, but it's fun once you get the hang of the instructions. Great sense of accomplishment. The final piece is beautiful and I'm just hoping it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny O

customer_reviews.title: Good construction; cheap, laminate finish.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are fine, just double check the drawings against the parts and go slow. It would help if the panels were marked but that would add cost. It goes together well and is pretty stout for an inexpensive piece. My beef is that the plastic laminate is too delicate. Two visible places had defects where the finish had peeled up or separated. I'll have to glue and probably use some brown dye to hide the problems. If it's this poorly attached now, what is it going to look like in 5 years?
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the piece is very low quality—it is made out of cheaply pressed wood that is dusty and wobbly, and the paint/wood stain that the company uses on the product has a strong odor that still hasn’t gone away after over 6 months of having the product. The assembly is also very complex and takes several hours. I bought this because I thought it was reasonably priced, but it is not worth even close to the price. There are much cheaper items on amazon that are far better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: It’s cheap and you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the hardware was missing and some of the cam locks were the wrong size. Some of the holes for the cam locks were the wrong size. They probably made the holes larger to fit the cam locks that were the wrong size but how is the buyer supposed to know that. Also I was told that all four sides were finished and that was not true as some areas showed unfinished wood along the top.
customer_reviews.author: BILL JENNETTE

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, reasonable price, not furniture you are going to leave for you grandchildren.
customer_reviews.text: Drawer rollers are very loose ... very little effort pull open and hit the stops/slam shut. The MDF Smell decreases over several weeks. Construction is straight forward but requires close attention. Few clues: every pre-drilled hole must be filled, some with wood dowels, before assembling. There were two kinds of cam connectors in the kit, one for the box and another for the drawers, worth separating at the start. Pay close attention top/bottom and front/back of the side panels for the installation of the drawer slides. A mistake I didn't make, is setting the power screwdriver to a low torque. It's easy enough to strip the pre-drilled screw holes.
customer_reviews.author: apthorp

customer_reviews.title: A pain putting together, and it broke one year later! WARNING!!
customer_reviews.text: They look great though the directions could be just a bit better. My wife put them together and it looked like a pain to put together. That said one year later this thing is falling apart...do they want to actually replace anything? NOT A CHANCE all they want is pictures to see what needs to be sent, mind you this is cheap wood. God this is going to be a pain! After getting off the phone with the warranty dept they have essentially tried to blame me for the issues here and wont be sending anything to help me with my warranty...
customer_reviews.author: M Carolin

customer_reviews.title: Decent, nice looking nightstand for the money. Customer service great!
customer_reviews.text: This is composite, not solid wood, as you'd expect for the price. It looks good once assembled. Assembly is straightforward, if you have a reasonable level of experience. (I did it alone with no problem.) I recommend laying out all the items and really studying the diagram thoroughly before beginning. I also found it helpful to assemble the drawers first, rather than toward the end (as instructed), in order to deal wth fewer screws, etc, as I was assembling the night stand itself. A note on customer service: one of the drawer knobs was defective. I contacted customer service and they immediately sent me a new one, no questions asked!
customer_reviews.author: L. Iraheta

customer_reviews.title: Best quality box furniture I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied all around with this product. Perfect size, perfect color (matched my bed frame color perfectly) and it looks great! Drawers close seamlessly, no gaps at all. In all, one beautiful piece of furniture! I am considering ordering another one for the other side of the bed. Assembly is a bit trickier than most box furniture I've assembled in the past, but this is a fairly complex piece with two drawers, so that was expected. My advice, read the instructions! They are very accurate and the diagrams are also very accurate. If you follow the directions step by step with exactness, you won't have any problems...don't rush, don't take shortcuts.
customer_reviews.author: RBoz

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and half put together
customer_reviews.text: Screws through the side, major chips and scratches, broken wood pieces and severe damage. Someone put it together, broke it, and then put it back. I’m pretty furious.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these back in November, but only assembled one then and had no issues with it. It’s worked well with my room. Today I started to assemble the second one and the holes on the sides were drilled wrong. This is a huge issue, making it pretty much worthless. (See photo, should be mirror image, not even close, half the holes aren’t even there and the ones that are are in the wrong place). Went to contact customer service and the website said page not found, so I’m screwed, can’t even order and pay for a replacement. Not happy and will not order from this supplier again.
customer_reviews.author: Chsmom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Unit, but directions are horrible
customer_reviews.text: Once assembled, all is good. I am a pretty handy guy and this little piece of furniture took my mind. None of the pieces of wood were labeled or stamped with the corresponding letters that were in the horribly un-detailed directions. I have put together many ikea, sullivan, and sauder pieces. I know what I'm doing, but with the lack of clear directions and lack of any of the wood pieces being labeled, it was a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: jazzyjeff3

customer_reviews.title: High Quality nightstands, you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these after years of mismatched nightstands. These nightstands were taller than the average nightstand, which we needed for our Sleep number bed. They came very well packed and the instructions were fantastic. Took me a few hours to put both of them together and they are solid and sturdy and beautiful. The drawers are heavy and open/close nicely. The little nook is great for all of our charging electronic gear while leaving the top available for whatever you need. I highly recommend these nightstands. They look beautiful, they're functional, and I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: The Cartoonist

customer_reviews.title: It's okay. A little fragile in some places though. Be careful when assembling to not hurt it
customer_reviews.text: While I do like this nightstand, the construction quality isn't that great on the sides. I was pushing the wood dowel rods in on the side of night stand and one bulged the side panel and cracked it. Talk about an eye sore. I mean you get what you pay for, and I should have been a bit more careful putting it together, but if it was better build quality I wouldn't have had to baby the thing while I put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Check the box to make sure all the pieces are in there before building
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I bought the matching dresser and figured this would be a little easier than the dresser to put together. Wrong. I put the entire night stand together then halfway through trying to build the drawers I realize the bottom part of the drawers that holds it together is missing. This was definitely not something made to be taken apart either, I pretty much destroyed it trying to ship it back for return just because a few pieces were missing. Check everything before you start building. I just hope the return process is simple
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The instructions should be labeled clearer. The blue sliding wheel in the drawer matches with whither blue in the body of the nightstand. Same with the red. There is a little “R” labeled in red to signify the right side of the nightstand. Right means when you are looking at the furniture straight in from the front. You will need a hammer. And a power drill. A screwdriver also helps. They missed a part so I had to go to the hardware store to replace it. The wood chips and scratches easily so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Particle Board
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I never even opened the box for this item. I was putting together the matching dresser, following the instructions carefully (as other Amazon reviews had complained about the complexity of putting together the dresser), and the particle board basically disintegrated wherever it was attached to the hardware. I just assume that this item is made with the same shotty quality.
customer_reviews.author: N. C.

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected and Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: This is surprisingly high quality for being a ready to assemble product. I mean, it's MDF and not wood, but I've put together lots of furniture like this in my lifetime, and this was the easiest and best quality of any of them. It was super easy too assemble, instructions were clear, no missing pieces, holes were lined up perfectly, and it was sturdy and tight when complete. The drawers slide in easily and fit perfectly. I'm so impressed that I ordered the Sonoma 5-drawer chest to match it.
customer_reviews.author: Belle C

customer_reviews.title: What a nightmare!
customer_reviews.text: The product came in a million pieces and the bottom of the drawers are cardboard sheets. One of the "wood" pieces were made improperly with the holes oriented wrong, so the top shelf's unfinished side is facing outward. I misaligned the drawer rail, so now it won't sit properly. The cams barely went in during assembly, so I doubt I can fix it at this point. If it survives, I'll update this to two stars. Otherwise, I'm taking it out back and smashing it to pieces with a mattock. Good riddance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this picture included
customer_reviews.text: This is super sturdy No wobble at all and doesn't look cheap I'm considering getting another I love the slot I use it to hold my books next to the bed Drawers aren't huge but they hold a good amount of items Sometimes the instructions aren't super clear so pay attention and don't rush and think it through and it goes together very easy Hint on rail tracks.... wheels are color coded ... all red on one side all blue on the other the same color tracks will align with each other
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Not good....missing parts and loose draw
customer_reviews.text: So annoyed, we put this together today first off the draw we where able to finish is really loose once it's in place we couldn't put the other draw together it was shipped with 4 missing bolts that we need to finish the draw!!!!!! I tried to message Amazon to see if they could help but my only option is to return it and have a new one shipped......seriously take it apart repack it .....so now I'm left trying to hunt down bolts of the right size or have an unfinished dresser.....very very unhappy ....don't get this, if you do make sure it's from a place you can easily get help
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: and they worked out beautifully in terms of capacity
customer_reviews.text: Given the price, you really can't beat these little nightstands! We bought two of them for placement next to king bed on a black platform frame, and they worked out beautifully in terms of capacity, function and height. They're a bit of a chore to assemble (time consuming), but they're well-made for the price. If I have any complaint at all, it would be that the satin black finish is easily scratched. In fact, I suspect at some point I'll need to coat/repaint the tops with a more durable satin black finish of some sort, maybe a polyurethane or comparable. Otherwise, no real complaints on these great little cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Wingnut

customer_reviews.title: Good value product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to put beside my bed and I'm pretty happy with it. My bed is a little higher up so finding a nightstand that was tall enough proved to be a challenge, but this certainly does the job. The finish is very clean and I really like the color. Had to assemble my self as it was shipped in pieces. Product was shipped within the time frame and came in perfect condition. Great value buy for someone looking for a nice nightstand but not necessarily trying to spend too much money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice nightstand for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a taller nightstand with a decent storage capacity to match my new bedframe and chest of drawers, but didn't want to spend a whole lot of money. For the price, the style and quality are better than I expected. Although the finish is a little more matted than it looks on the website, they look great! If you have put furniture together before, assembly is pretty straightforward. The first one took me about an hour and the second one about half that time. Overall I recommend this nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D. Bickel

customer_reviews.title: I recommend laying out everything in the box and running an ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of the black ones and I am very impressed by this product. I recommend laying out everything in the box and running an inventory of all parts. The first stand took me about an hour and a half to construct, but the second one only took me about 40 minutes. It is very low impact work with a nice hammer and a power drill. Both stands feel very sturdy and look great by my bed. The drawers slide in and out smoothly and do not wobble.
customer_reviews.author: William Sebren

customer_reviews.title: I’m am very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to my bedroom! Slowly updating my furniture and saw this cutie. Needed something a bit smaller than my previous one. It came fairly quickly and was easy to put together. Packaged nicely and had no damage. WARNING: None of the parts were labeled and all screws were mixed together in one bag. Had to use the pictures and guess if I had everything the correct way. Will be drilling a hole in the back top cubby part so I can pass my tablet charger through. It is also spacious as I have put my laptop and tablet in there. Other than that, I am very pleased with this purchase and may get another one for my guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Chay

customer_reviews.title: Nice nightstand - assembly instructions not great
customer_reviews.text: I really love this roomy and elegant nightstand. Assembling it took at least couple of hours because the instructions aren’t great. The parts aren’t labeled and it takes a bit of detective work to figure out which rectangular board is which. I realized at one point that I’d put one piece on in the wrong direction, and had to carefully take it apart (luckily nothing broke, despite the materials being pretty fragile). So it took a while. Worth it, as the end result is a nice nightstand, but even for someone like me who has assembled a lot of internet furniture, this was challenging, as the instructions leave a lot of room for error.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Alright piece of furniture, but got moldy.
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review because I found mold growing inside the nook area and I haven’t ever had mold grow on a piece of furniture like this before...if you live in a humid climate you might wanna skip this one. (I work with mold-it’s not an easy fix because the wood is porous and the mold will most likely bloom again after cleaning.)
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: Get them !!
customer_reviews.text: IGNORE ALL THE BAD REVIEWS. This nightstand is great quality it's so well made and beautiful. We love it . I mean I don't understand why all these bad reviews and all the complaints about how hard to put it on. It took me an hour and half to put 2 of them together. But it's true they are no labels on the wood. But you can clearly see them on the instructions with details. It's so beautiful and great nightstand. Highly recommend. Note I got them for my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Al Haek

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece for my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: This manufacturer knows how to package items of this size and weight so they don't arrive damaged. Very satisfied with that. The product itself is pretty good for the type of structure it is. For the price and value ratio I gave it 4 stars. It is not solid wood, so if that is what you are looking for, look elsewhere, but for my 12 year old daughter, it is great and looks great too. I would not hesitate to recommend this item to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No numbers on pieces as the directions says there are.  What HAPPENED... took over 2 hours!
customer_reviews.text: DISAPPOINTED... NO C-! through C-10 labels or numbers on pieces.. what a hassle and very time consuming to assemble without what it says was indicated in the instructions! Please make sure other people that purchase this item receive a pile of product to assemble without the puzzle numbers to make it work. ALSO! the top of the nightstand had a visible dent in the white paint where whom ever glances at it will notice the nick/dent in the white paint. Not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: We searched lots of places for nightstands when we moved into our new home. I was skeptical to buy anything online, not knowing first hand what quality material we would be getting. We decided to go with this product since we’ve had great experiences buying from Amazon previously. The nightstands are very good quality. They were packaged great so nothing was scratched or broken when it arrived. The assembly was fairly easy and everything was labeled. The instructions included pictures which was helpful. The nightstands look great in our room and we are 100% happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This item is extremely hard to assemble. The items are labled in the instruction manual but trying to differentiate the items from the manual to the actual products is really hard. This took me hours to assemble, I even YouTubed some material. My recommendation for the manufacturer is to place stickers on the product to make assembly easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very stylish, easy to assemble, smooth sliding of drawers, lots of storage!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE LOVE LOVE these!!! These are so elegant and simple when assembled. We have them in our master bedroom and they are the perfect size. The two drawers offer loads of storage space and the small shelf is perfect for putting items you may want to reach more easily (such as a book you're reading or the remote control). The nightstands were easy to assemble and came out looking very professional! One bonus feature is that the drawers slide open VERY easily, the hallmark of a quality piece of furniture! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: YolandaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Piece of Furniture!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not that great at putting stuff together. But this nightstand was easy to assemble, instructions were pretty clear and the pictures in the instructions are great. It is much bigger than I thought (which is great!). It is very sturdy, the 2 draws glide so smoothly, without any wobble or wiggle. This is a fine piece of furniture, particularly at the price. I saw much smaller pieces for more on other sites.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: The item was easy to assemble (fyi
customer_reviews.text: Received product in April and assembled now in my new bedroom. After reading numerous positive feedback and reviews about the nightstand, decided to buy as the black decor and nickel drawer knob`s match the room`s decor. The item was easy to assemble (fyi: i`m pretty handy with such assembly), the instructions didn`t have much written instructions but the diagrams were clearly drawn and labeled that made assembly easy. Product is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rubaiat Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Nice! I recommend these if you’re on a budget!
customer_reviews.text: These nightstands are good for what they are. Great size and functionality. Sturdy handles. Hold a lot of stuff! Love the color considering it’s just laminated particle board. Very easy to assemble and no parts missing. My only complaint is one out of the two nightstands I bought, one of the drawers is crooked and not aligned flush to the other drawer so there is a slight angled gap in between. It bugs me, but oh well. It is what it is!
customer_reviews.author: Minny Kim

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Really loving this side table so far. First the height is perfect, our bed sits up so this was exactly the height we needed. The packaging was very well done, so every item was well protected. The instructions were actually pretty easy to follow, although I struggled with the drawer slides, didn't feel like the instructions were very clear as to what went where but I quickly figured it out. It's a sturdy piece and I'm glad to have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Affordable, Quality Piece
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these a couple of weeks apart and couldn't be happier. Both arrived in fine condition. After laying out all of the parts and taking the time to match them up with the diagrams in the instructions, the nightstands were very easy and fun to assemble. Almost nothing is labeled, but if you take the time to look at the pictures and placement of holes and such, it's easy to see what goes where and in what orientation. Once fully assembled, both felt very strong and stable, and they seem like good quality pieces. I'm extremely happy and look forward to buying more from this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ni'anhel Moore

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty easy once I figured out what each part was and organized the screws. My only complaint would be that they could have at least put stickers on the pieces labeling which was G3 and G4 and so on. Really love how sturdy it is, very nice looking and has more than enough room to put things in. Definitely recommend. My only qualm was that the last screw for the drawer wouldn't go in right and cracked the wood so I just left it out
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great value
customer_reviews.text: Needed new nightstands, shopped around online and in stores, all I could find was either great stands that were $300 plus or junk stands for $100. Found these, read reviews, and felt confident enough to order two. They arrived, I started the assembly process which was a bit tricky (had to really get into it, focus hard, search and watch some videos online) but ultimately got them put together and I LOVE them. They’re very sturdy, perfect size, great storage, simply beautiful. The only thing I will say is the “washed black” that appeared grey when I ordered are simply black. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: JACKIE SHORT

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Much taller than my old night stand. It's beautiful and sleek. The outside shell itself is particle board but the drawers are sturdy and solid wood. I bout this along with the matching chest of drawers and dresser and they all look wonderful aside from a few small chips here and there on the inside that are easily disguised when assembled. I would recommend coasters to the top to give longevity and to avoid any ugly water rings.
customer_reviews.author: Envidya

customer_reviews.title: Do not lean on product while building, it will definitely break, made of cheap particle board
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the fact that this product is made of particle board, it is nice and looks nice. Gets the job done, just don’t lean on anything while you’re building it or it will definitely break. Also, dings easilt, be very careful when putting together because every Knick will show
customer_reviews.author: Feistykev

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking night stand, but it was missing the drawer bottoms. We have to go buy wood thin enough to fit because I am not shipping it back. Update: I called the company about the missing drawer bottoms and after almost two weeks they are here. So go to assemble to find out they have the wrong size locking screws for one drawer. Wish I would have known that when calling about the drawers.
customer_reviews.author: hotmama

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Right size. White. Holds my 24" white flat screen smart TV. with an open area for my clock and small Blu-Ray player. My husband and grandson put it together. Took longer than expected. They said some directions were a little confusing. Some things didn't go as planned. ANYWAY...they got it together, and it works perfectly for my needs. Still waiting for the smell to go away. It's typical of this kind of product material. It will in time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy in Madison

customer_reviews.title: NightSTANDING!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this nightstand. Just what I wanted. The open shelf above the drawers is great for putting things like your wallet, keys, and a phone charging station. I hate clutter. This made my room just a bit neater. Assembly took me a little time - there are a lot of pieces, but that's only a negative if you hate assembling furniture....I do not.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These nightstands are so tall! Exactly what I wanted due to my bed frame being higher on risers so I needed something to be around the same height. After reading previous reviews I expected it to be harder to put together but if you’ve ever put anything together before, you’ll be fine. I will say almost none of the pieces are labeled but there are only so many pieces and I never used the wrong piece on accident so just look at the pictures and make sure they match! I bought two of these and it took about 1.5 hours to do the first one and only an hour for the second one, including laying out all my pieces. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great purchase! Love the simple design and the size of it is perfect for me, wasn't hard at all putting together. The only things I'd say is that you have to nail in the back cover and the nails are showing, but you can just cover the nails or Sharpe on them (if you picked black), its made from a more cheaper material so if you're worried about that then thats a heads up, and if you look from the back not all of it is colored, but it's meant to be against a wall and I personally don't care about it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and not a bad price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, one in black and one in white, for my children. I have assembled many things in the past and the instructions on the nightstand were ok. I suggest reading ahead just to know what is coming. Mostly diagrams and figuring out which screws go with that particular step. Took about 45 minutes to assemble the nightstand. It is MDF, but still seems fairly tough. I would recommend this nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy to build
customer_reviews.text: my only complaint is that the pieces aren’t labeled. However, the packaging is great. Very nicely put together. Pull out the instructions and loon through it and it’s easy to see what is what. Simply follow the pictures. I will say, the pictures refer to pieces as C3 or C4 and it would be nice for a sticker but instead you just have to look at the picture and make it that way. That said, didn’t take long to put this together. Really easy and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: djames

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size, Price
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. I have been looking for months for something this size and this was literally the only chest I could find this size that didn’t cost $300! It’s easy to assemble. If you don’t understand the drawer slides, just look at something you already have or try Youtube. I’ve done drawers before, but I remember how confused I was the first time!
customer_reviews.author: Debb

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is NON-TRIVIAL but Well Worth It.
customer_reviews.text: We used these as nightstands for our small bedroom. The pieces are attractive and solid, once assembled. Assembly was made more difficult because not all of the parts were labeled. Thankfully all of the pieces on the drawing were labeled and quite well rendered - although not perfectly so. But pieces fit extremely well and we are pleased with the finished dresser/nightstands.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Berry

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad for the price. ordered 2 of them. one of the pieces on the one was a little too long, shaved it down slightly with a sander and fixed the problem. Just wanted something cheap for now and this suited perfectly. The only problem is the bevel on the top is sharp. Not exactly safe but if you know its there, then just be careful. besides that, good buy. no problem with shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Stucazzo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!!! Very impressed with the craftsmanship and sturdiness. The pictures in the instruction manual are a little off at times, and it's really important to get the drawer sliders placed right as this is one of the first steps and it would be difficult to change later. But once put together, this makes for a great little nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth F

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, but colors are inconsistent.
customer_reviews.text: The good news, its a good quality nightstand. Assembly is a bit over complicated, with some fasteners being almost identical to others, but cant be interchanged. And they are all mixed together in one bag. The bad news, if you want them to match, order them at the same time! The first one i ordered was cherry, and thays what came. The next one was labelled as cherry, but really was a brown. So was the replacement.....and their helpline is nonexistent. So, im stuck with one i cant match.
customer_reviews.author: megaladon

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist Look. Ample Storage Space.
customer_reviews.text: Nightstand is better than I expected. Packaged very well. The hardware was all in one plastic bag. The cabinet sliders are color coded: BLUE is Left, RED is Right. As long as you review the instructions beforehand, categorize the hardware and have necessary tools needed before starting, assembling the nightstand will go smoothly. I love the simple style and ample storage space. My husband will be happy to have this next to his side of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: mjack005

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are drawn incorrectly
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered on time and all the parts were there and fit together ok. This gets 3 stars because we would have done much better with NO instructions. In several places, they weren't just unclear, they were drawn incorrectly. If you put this together strictly from the instructions, it will never work. Too bad, its a nice sturdy table once assembled. We did ok because we have put together a lot of other furniture and cabinets so we could figure it out on our own without the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: average user

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, looks more expensive.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice looking nightstands, however when you touch them you are instantly reminded of how much they really cost. The drawers are flimsy and rattle as you open them, the wood is also mostly balsa, making them too light and cheap feeling. None of the internals of the cabinet are sealed to protected from any type of water damage, making accidental damage easy. However I would say the build quality still matches the price and as I said earlier they look quite nice. Overall I really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Super sleek
customer_reviews.text: So in love with the finished product. These nightstands were exactly what I was looking for. They're at a good height with more than enough room to put away your personal stuff. Even my picky boyfriend was impressed by how sleek they were. Putting it together was a little confusing. I recommend seeing their video first (it's right before the reviews); it will make putting it together a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: this is a good one
customer_reviews.text: Mine was delivered promptly and was complete and without defects. It is well made and sturdy and fit together perfectly. The drawers have metal tracks with rollers that work well. The instructions are clear. It is larger than some others, note the dimensions. Tip: the black special fasteners are hard to screw in. Use a lubricant - beeswax or the like. The screw will raise a burr. Remove the burr and screw the fastener in all the way to avoid a gap when assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Allan W. Rees

customer_reviews.title: While watching a great movie, I assembled BOTH nightstands in 2 1/2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Others took a long time to put this together. I opened and labeled all parts with painters tape for the first night stand. I made sure I had all the nuts and bolts to assemble it. Then I opened the second one in a different room. I followed directions, implicitly. I completed step 1 on the labeled parts, and proceeded to do the same of the second nightstand. While watching a great movie, I assembled BOTH nightstands in 2 1/2 hours, using just a Phillips head screwdriver. I love these nightstands! The drawers slide in and out so smoothly and the shelf has a lip that will not let things fall on the floor. Bravo!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Looks so much better than expected for an $80 nightstand
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this nightstand! We bought a nice sleigh bed last year, and I had some sticker shock when I saw what it would cost to get the matching nightstands...this one was less than a quarter of the cost of ONE of the matching ones and it looks great! For the price, I was impressed with the quality. The height is great for my DEEP mattress. Was fast and easy to put together (about an hour, with several interruptions). We will be buying the second for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had a bad experience with it
customer_reviews.text: I had difficulties building it, it was my first time, I got frustrated and tried to make it fit but ended up breaking pieces and when I gave up and used a drill it was crooked.. I had a bad experience with it, you may not but I learned my lesson and lost almost 90 dollars
customer_reviews.author: eaqm562

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had read the other 1 star reviews before buying this junk.
customer_reviews.text: The drawers were not cut properly and the bottom piece would NOT fit into the slots. Possibly, the worst piece of furniture I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Also bought 5 drawer tall chest along with this. Afyer installing the big one first, this ight stand just took an hour to put together. You would still need an electric driver and hammer to make the job easier. Looks excellent and sturdy. Blends well into the decor along side our anarasia ashley queen white bed. I am using the extra open shelf to keep my personal projector and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Big Boy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a nightstand for the bedroom but didn’t want to pay a ton of money. First it’s and $80 piece of furniture, so I wasn’t expecting hard wood. I was very satisfied with the quality for the price, pretty easy to put together and really looks nice in the room. Only wished I’d purchased a lighter color to match the rest of the bedroom furniture better. Over all, love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Phelixp

customer_reviews.title: nice little piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: ordered this for my son's room, it is a little small so i needed to shop around for the right size to make better use of space. im giving this 4 stars because the item arrived without instructions, i called the manufacturer and they emailed me instructions right away and the lady was very courteous. the second part is one of the pieces did not fit well so there is a slight look of balance on one of the drawers. Other than that it is a very sturdy and easy to put together piece of furniture, my son and I are very happy with it and it looks great in his room. will definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Love my new nightstand!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new nightstand! I read the previous reviews & questions/answers which were really helpful (thank you for the information!). It took me about 2.5 hours to build, but everything went really smoothly. As suggested in previous comments, I laid out all of the pieces and identified them as well as separating out all hardware by type before I even started - these 2 steps were a huge help and key to getting the project finished smoothly. The finished nightstand is really nice - it looks great, is sturdy, and I couldn't be happier! 5-stars all around!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Pieces missing out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, but one did not include two pieces and therefore cannot be completed. I don't know if these pieces can be sent to me or not, but without them I can not finish the build of one of these. They are the two smaller front facing moulding pieces. Overall, it is typical build quality of particle board covered and a plastic-type wrap. The drawer sliders are a little more rough than other furniture that I have owned. Once all put together, this is a solid nightstand and still considering ordering additional parts of the set depending on if I can get the missing pieces to my first nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: M. W.

customer_reviews.title: I love these nightstands for what they are
customer_reviews.text: I love these nightstands for what they are, an inexpensive but quality-looking piece of furniture. The nightstand was very easy to assemble, it took me no more than half an hour from start to finish. I like the small nook between the top of the stand and the drawers. The only thing that irritates me about the product, is that sometimes the bottoms of the drawers slip around, so items in the trop drawer end up falling into the bottom drawer or getting stuck. Otherwise, this is an easily assembled and good-looking product for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Forest

customer_reviews.title: Loving the cubby space
customer_reviews.text: A solid choice for the price, assembly was fairly simple and intuitive, and it looks great What you lose in the third drawer is more than made up for with the cubby space that replaces said drawer, as a modern man I have more chargers and devices that need charging than I can shake a stick at, and this cubby space gives a perfect place to charge devices (especially great for charging things that have distracting lights)
customer_reviews.author: trueravik

customer_reviews.title: DIRECTIONS MISSING STEPS
customer_reviews.text: FYI for those getting this, you need to add the screw locks on the drawers BEFORE adding the guide rails. i had to take the drawers halfway apart to put them in. they are necessary for making the front panel attach more sturdily.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Great nightstands
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these nightstands. I did do lots of research and reading reviews on numerous products before deciding on this one. They came very well packaged and protected. The instructions are clear and if you take the time to read it carefully. Things are labeled and if it's not labeled, you can easily figure it out based on the pictures. They are both very durable after assembly and look great. I have a tall bed and they work great. I would definitely recommend these especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: london8875

customer_reviews.title: Wrong and Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: The vendors sent the product with the wrong back cover. The one that was advertised was bigger and higher quality Thant the one I received. It looks fine upfront but the back is looks like I grabbed two different night stands and put them together. The product didn't come with all the pieces and handles that appear in the instruction manual. The top part of the nightstand is not completely attached you can't pick it up from there, or risk the entire thing coming apart. Otherwise the product is good enough to serve as a little table.
customer_reviews.author: Lesbia

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old, used, beat-up night stand with this. I love it so far! Putting it together is a little time-consuming, but if you pay attention to the instructions and take your time it's not very difficult. of course, I love putting these kinds of things together, so that might make a difference. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Free At Last

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: So glad we bought this. We needed a bigger and sturdy night stand and this is perfect. Took about 1 hour to assembly...only issue we had were not all the individual parts were labeled so we had to examine the pictures more. Absolutley love this! Drawers are great and the bottom drawer is big enough to hold my nail UV lamp with all the accessories!
customer_reviews.author: easytarget

customer_reviews.title: Great if you're a reader, or if you have cats!
customer_reviews.text: This unit went together well, and it's pretty solid. It looks really nice once it's together. It's slightly taller than my bed and that's a miscalculation on my part of course. I love the open space to place my books and other loose items that used to sit on top of my old night stand, it keeps things cleaner looking and more organized. It's also harder for my cats to knock them off and wake me up from in there. No one likes when books fall on their face ;) The drawers are spacey but not too big to lose everything and they slide in and out really well. I'd definitely recommend this stand.
customer_reviews.author: Spirited

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: By the time I found time to put it together it was unbelievably hard to assemble. None of the pieces were labeled and the directions weren’t easy to follow. It was too late for me return and I was extremely disappointed. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Chan Chan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This was super simple to assemble. Most of the pieces are connected with hidden cam locks. You just insert the pin in 1 side and the cam in the other. Then give it a 1/4 turn to lock. Easy. I used an air stapler to attach the back and I think that'll work better than the provided nails. Once assembled the piece seems very rigid and sturdy. Drawers slide easily.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Piper

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and useful
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my mom's apartment. One between her 2 chairs and one by the bed. Very sturdy and look nice, not cheap looking. 2 drawers and slot are very nice for storing things and they are a good size, a little wider than most small end tables. Very nice. Not that hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Jane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Night Stand
customer_reviews.text: An excellent night stand. Sturdy. Looks great. Really do appreciate the extra space between the top and the drawers. I like to put my laptop there but helps in a number of ways to keep the top from being over crowded. We also drilled a little hole in the back and ran a charger through. So I can put my phone in the middle there and it charges. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kashmir

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but low quality
customer_reviews.text: From reading the reviews it seems a lot of folks bought this for their kids. I guess that should've been a warning before buying for an adult. Assembly took a joyless hour. The screws are covered with plastic caps that give it a cheap look. The drawers are flimsy. After a year of use, the inevitable dings look pretty bad because the item is not solid wood - it's composite wood covered with a cherry or white plastic coating. I can understand a positive review for a kid's room. For an adult, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Norris

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad that I purchased this night stand I was hesitating for awhile whether I wanted to buy this. I didn’t want to end up spending money on something that wasn’t worth the price. When I received my package I was so excited when it was all put together it looks amazing. The material isn’t cheap, it’s a lot bigger than I expected and I love that. My daughter was excited to see her new night stand the drawers are deep which you can store a lot of things in it. I definitely would recommend this night stand.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Great night stand! It only took me about an hour or so to put everything together. The only thing I didn’t like was that the pieces weren’t labeled (A,B,C, etc). Although, the directions provided clear and precise images of the pieces so I was able to figure it out easily! Just make sure when putting this together to look at the pictures carefully especially for the drawers. The drawers were thankfully labeled right and left (color coordinated). I’m satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, Functional, and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've ordered, they are easy to make (but there are a lot of parts that are very similar so make sure to differentiate!) and am always happy with the outcome. I love the open shelf along with the two drawers. It's also not huge so it doesn't take up too much space and it is easy to move once you assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: madison mooney

customer_reviews.title: Bad instruction but great product
customer_reviews.text: Took me and my daughter about 2 hours to put it together. We are both experienced. The instructions are horrible. We had to make several correct we caught a long the way. I looked at local furniture companies for similar, assembled night stands, and they were all about $50 more.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The instructions were easy to follow and I had it together in 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: This nightstand matches the description and is just what we were looking for, for my 8 year old daughter's room. The instructions were easy to follow and I had it together in 30 minutes. It feels pretty solid. I was impressed with color coded drawer rails, and the solid wood drawer sides. There was a chip in the veneer on the decorative toe kick which couldn't be easily seen once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: CherryExtract

customer_reviews.title: Its cheap but does the job
customer_reviews.text: I just finished assembling this. Two things that really irritated me about the process: -There was sawdust and little scuffs all over the wood material. Most of the scuffs luckily came out. -While the different pieces have labels in the directions (such as c1-7 and d1-7), practically none of the parts were labeled, so you had to carefully review the number of holes and hope it was correct. Overall, theres a reason its a $90 nightstand. It is not the highest quality material but seems sturdy. It's functional and looks good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Good overall but poor assembly experience
customer_reviews.text: I found building this product to be somewhat difficult. The pieces were poorly labeled and I spent a great deal of time making sure I was putting it together in the right direction with the right pieces. I was very impressed with the look of the product until I realized that the bottom drawer sits crooked. Kinda drives me crazy, but it was also a really good price. I spent about 3.5 hours putting this together. I would buy again because the functionality (most important to me) is excellent. The drawers glide easily and the overall product seems to be very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Nightstand
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shelf it is particleboard but for the price and the look is exactly what I needed. It got here fast. I love puzzles so putting this together was easy for me. All of the parts screws, attachment knobs, and nails were in a bag. They were just tossed into a bag that sucked. I was somewhat disappointed on the packing job. I would expect that from Walmart not here. The instructions were really easy to follow for me. Just separating all of the nuts bolts and screws was a pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C Adsit

customer_reviews.title: Great Nightstand, Cumbersome Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, especially for the price. Quality materials, to the point that we specifically sought the brand out for our secondary purchase of 2 nightstands in a different finish. Did not give 5 stars because the assembly was time consuming and cumbersome. The drawers were the WORST to assemble, but love the actual piece itself.
customer_reviews.author: Tara U

product_meta.title: Prepac Fremont 2 Drawer Nightstand with Open Shelf, Espresso, Tall
product_meta.description: Color:Espresso| Style Name:FremontElegance and efficiency unite in the Fremont Tall 2 Drawer Nightstand with Open Shelf. This bedside table is more than its two full-sized drawers: it also offers an open shelf for all those items you don’t want totally hidden away. Pile your books, lamp and alarm clock on top, and enjoy waking up next to this capable and beautiful piece of furniture. Coordinate with other items in the Fremont Bedroom Collection for added elegance!
feature_bullets: Curved top edges, side moldings, an arched base panel and antique bronze-finished knobs
Drawers run smoothly on metal glides with built-in safety stops
Clear lacquered real wood drawer sides
Finished in durable rich espresso laminate
Constructed from CARB-compliant, laminated composite woods with a sturdy MDF backer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,480 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 5 year limited manufacturer warranty on parts.
